text: Mee deelaa bolo ga hagaodi ana helekai, gei tuai dangada hai hegau ga hanaga labelaa ga helekai, “Nia buini dauwa e dolu o digau Chaldea gu heebagi mai gi gimaadou, guu kae nia ‘camel’, gu daaligi au gau ngalua huogodoo guu mmade, ko au hua modogoau dela ne lele hagammuni belee hagi adu gi di goe.”
